data.name: 粤剧帝女花VR版
data.detailed_description: This application uses motion capture, modeling, animation binding and other technologies to create an immersive virtual reality stage scene, so that users can experience and watch the imperial and DiNvHua opera. Users can watch this visual feast from any free angle in an all-round way
data.about_the_game: This application uses motion capture, modeling, animation binding and other technologies to create an immersive virtual reality stage scene, so that users can experience and watch the imperial and DiNvHua opera. Users can watch this visual feast from any free angle in an all-round way
data.short_description: "DiNvHua" is the name of a Cantonese Opera premiered in 1957. The author is Tang Disheng. The background of this play is the sixth year of Chongzhen in the late Ming Dynasty. The opera tells the tragic love story between Princess Changping and Zhou Shixian.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: inter I7 6700K or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 3060 or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
